|brand = Bigfoot Networks |model = Killer Wireless-N |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = 1103 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = September 29, 2011 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Bigfoot_Networks_Killer_Wireless-N_1103 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = N450 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = (half)
|vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 0030 |subvendor_id = 1a56 |subdevice_id = 2001 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = PPD-AR5BHB112 |icid = 4104A-AR5BHB112 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 84:4B:F5, 9C:2A:70, D0:DF:9A, E0:06:E6
|chip1 = Atheros;AR9380; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 3 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 3 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 450/450 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/13/2010 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 857422004112 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |asin = B005GA1N7I |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== 3x3:3 MIMO
*The device is assumed to be using the [[Atheros AR5BHB112]] reference design. :Manuf. by Lite-On or Foxconn (U98Z081, QCABHB1103A).
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.bigfootnetworks.com/assets/Company/Media-Center/Datasheets/Final-KIller-Wireless-N-1103-Datasheet.pdf Datasheet] *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/4726/qualcomm-atheros-acquires-bigfoot-networking Qualcomm Atheros acquires Bigfoot Networking - AnandTech]
